 | name = Yahoo!Xtra url = http://nz.yahoo.com/ screenshot = commercial = Yes
 | type = Internet portal registration = Optional owner = Telecom New Zealand
 | and Yahoo!7 launch date = March 2007
}}

'Yahoo!Xtra' was a New Zealand web portal that existed under that name from 2007
to 2011. It was a joint venture between Yahoo!7 and Telecom New Zealand. Yahoo!7
held a 51 percent stake in the company and Telecom NZ held 49 percent. Because
Yahoo!7 is a 50/50 venture, Yahoo! proper was therefore a 25.5% owner of
Yahoo!Xtra. Telecom announced in April 2011 that it had sold its share to
Yahoo!7 and Yahoo!Xtra was rebranded as Yahoo! New Zealand.
